title: Taken by Night

With bountiful curves, gorgeous mocha skin and lips made for kissing, she’s exactly what he’d hoped for in a mate. Who cared that they were different species?  After a night of sin, Tina realizes she isn’t just over her heat, she’s got bigger problems at hand. Like the fact her one night stand turns out to be her boss. Unfortunately for her, it appears one night wasn’t really what he had in mind.  Reader Note: This story contains some smokin' hot sex.
